subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Thorburn scored 36 seconds into the third period and Marc-André Fleury made the lead stand, finishing with 33 saves Tuesday night in the Pittsburgh Penguins’ 3-2 victory over the Islanders.
snippet: Chris Thorburn scored 36 seconds into the third period and Marc-André Fleury made the lead stand, finishing with 33 saves Tuesday night in the Pittsburgh Penguins’ 3-2 victory over the Islanders.
